issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
While changing images I noticed, that images #14 and #23 are not loading. 
xCode console shows:
[ERROR] Failed to load remote image at 14: Returned invalid image data
[ERROR] Failed to load remote image at 23: Returned invalid image data

Steps:
1. Run KitchenSink
2. Go to Base UI-Views-Coverflow View-Coverflow Remote Files

Expected result:
All images should be loaded.

Actual result:
Images #14 and #23 do not load.
fields.summary: iOS: KitchenSink - Images fail to load

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
